channel.title: Building Blocks on SynthDIY Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Building Blocks on SynthDIY Wiki

item.title: Bake your own vactrols !
item.description: An optocoupler allows signal transmition between two isolated circuits with two parts: an LED that emits infrared light and a photosensitive device (LDR) which detects light from the LED.

item.title: CV Input to Microcontroller
item.description: Many digital modules will need at least one CV input, however you have likely noticed that while Eurorack can have Â±12V travelling through its patch cables, most microcontrollers will be very unhappy to receive anything outside of the range 0-3.

item.title: Digital Input to Microcontroller
item.description: Most microcontrollers run on either 3.3V or 5V logic, whereas Eurorack gates and triggers are usually between 5-8V.
